name: Unreal Engine Horror Level
description:
This is a horror level I put together in unreal engine 4 with a bunch of asset packs. Inspired from the Gothic and the Lovecraftian genres of Horror. None of the 3D models were made by me, all these assets can be found on the Unreal engine asset store.

This was the first time I used the landscape and the foliage tools in the unreal engine.I genuinely thought that making landscapes would be much harder. But once you get used to the tools, the possibilities are limitless.
